column1: Little Goat Diner////Came here for dinner with my friend who's in town. We both stewed over the drinks and food menus for 20 minutes. Ultimately
column2: he copied me (!) and we both got the "This Little Piggy went to China
column3: which is a sesame cheddar biscuit with sunny side eggs, Szechuan pork sausage, chili garlic chive sauce, and strawberries. Sounds weird but it works. We also split a side of pork belly home fries, which was totally unnecessary because we were so full from little piggy.
